title: Low FPS from patch 6.9
body:
I have a pretty decent computer, I get around 200 fps when playing league on very high but ever since I updated this morning my fps has been going insane.

On very high I got as low as 9 fps, When i set it to very low, I can kinda play, but it goes from 20 to 30 to 60 fps constantly back and forth. The two games I played no one else had this problem and I couldn't find anyone else with this problem. I was playing last night so I don't understand why I would get such bad fps.

replies.body: I had this Prob in a Ranked game not to long ago an I have a PC not a Mac so I don't think it's just mac problem.
I'm having the same issue, especially when it goes towards late game I end up having ~10 frames and I usually have 80-100. By chance are you using a mac?
Same thing with me and I'm using a mac. Pretty sure just another mac issue.
same issue, i stopped playing till they fix it
I'm having the same problem, it freezes on teamfights and I play with 15 fps... I've stopped playing, waiting riot to fix this.

I am having the same problem, and it drives me nuts. I reinstalled ALL drivers, nearly did a system reset too. I have a gaming laptop and well, its doing just fine with: fallout 4, diablo 3, overwatch, HOTS, etc.

I repaired the client ofc. , I have a 300mb internet conection, so that should not be an issue, however the game is freezing, my ping is over 9000 (pun intended, and true at the same time) without any apparent reason...i mean, what is going on?

I would appreciate any further information.
I have the same problem(tho i have a toaster) I noticed everything is fine until jungle spawns

While I know that there has been a lingering issue for Mac users when it comes to FPS issues, most FPS issues can usually be solved by completing all of the steps in our [FPS Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).  More often than not, this involves some sort of weird interaction between software (and drivers) and the physical hardware itself.

Let me know if you are still consistently having these issues!

Yeah I'm on PC and literally just reinstalled the game in addition to updating all of my drivers. I even have a desktop built specifically for gaming and normally had 200+ FPS and now hover anywhere from 20-40 depending on my activity. Like can you let us know if you guys are even looking into the problem? It honestly breaks the game.

If you are running a gaming rig, then there definitely seems like something else is going on here as to why your FPS drops so drastically.  In order to investigate this further and figure out what is going on, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  One of our Tech Specialists can investigate further and see if we can find a root cause.  Make sure to include the following as well:

1) [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)

2) [Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7j3cEKLA,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2016-05-06T21:15:29.498+0000)
>
> If you are running a gaming rig, then there definitely seems like something else is going on here as to why your FPS drops so drastically.  In order to investigate this further and figure out what is going on, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  One of our Tech Specialists can investigate further and see if we can find a root cause.  Make sure to include the following as well:
> 
> 1) [DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
> 
> 2) [Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)
> 
> 3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

My FPS dropped this patch on my gaming rig as well.

I'm not sending in a ticket because you guys don't respond to my tickets.

I went ahead and sent everything over to you guys (sorry I couldn't do it earlier) so I hope to hear back from you guys soon! 

Thanks so much for trying! 

As a side note, I'm running WoW, Blade and Soul, Hearthstone, and Oldschool Runescape right now at the same time with maximum settings and have no problems with fps on any of them (they're all sitting at about 200 except Runescape because, well, spaghetti)
I'm using Windows and have tried all of those,nothing has changed
yeah after 6.9 i been lagging too
I'm adding my voice here just to say that I too have been experiencing lag/latency in patch 6.9 on a 2013 15-inch Retina Macbook Pro.

Yeah I have the same problem as well and I'm not even using a mac. My usual fps before was over 100 but now my fps gets super low like 12 when teamfights break out. I even reinstalled my graphics card rivers and did the repair option for league. My client is also a bit slow too which is strange like choosing a champ in a rank select it takes 10 seconds to just bring up the champion menu.
IM ALSO having huge issue.. please solve its unplayable at the moment

I always had around ~50 fps down to ~30 when there was a lot of going on on the screen, which was ok i guess.
After 6.9 the game is literally unplayable becasue it starts with ~25 and later on its around 10 fps...
I've checked task manager durring game and my CPU usage was at 70%, RAM around 50% so i don't think it is only a problem of low end machines.

Also, from my observations, it looks like it is only happening on 5v5 Summoners Rift (ARAM and 3v3 are ok). Maybe it has something to do with new dragons?
